name: progressbar-plugin
callback: $(function () {     console.log('called the callback');       $('#photoGallery').jqxScrollView({ width: 600, height: 450, buttonsOffset: [0, 0]});            $('#StartBtn').jqxButton({ theme: 'Arctic' });            $('#StopBtn').jqxButton({ theme: 'Arctic' });            $('#StartBtn').click(function () {                $('#photoGallery').jqxScrollView({ slideShow: true });     });            $('#StopBtn').click(function () {                $('#photoGallery').jqxScrollView({ slideShow: false });          });        });
